text: The men's 4 x 100 metres relay event at the 2005 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Erfurt, Germany, at Steigerwaldstadion on 17 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Oudéré Kankarafou Idrissa M'Barke Eddy De Lépine David Alerte ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Florian Rentz Marius Broening Sebastian Ernst Till Helmke ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Rosario La Mastra Alessandro Rocco Stefano Anceschi Koura Kaba Fantoni ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 17 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 2005 European Athletics U23 Championships – Men's 4 × 100 metres relay
